hymn.title: The days may yet grow darker
hymn.category: Comfort in Trials—By Closer Fellowship with the Lord

layout.singingstanza: The days may yet grow dark -- er, The nights more wea -- ry grow, And Je -- sus may still tar -- ry, But this one thing I know: The Lord will still grow dear -- er, And fel -- low -- ship will be The clos -- er and the sweet -- er Bet -- ween my Lord and me.

lyrics.stanza: The days may yet grow darker, The nights more weary grow, And Jesus may still tarry, But this one thing I know: The Lord will still grow dearer, And fellowship will be The closer and the sweeter Between my Lord and me.

'Tis our dear Lord we wait for, Our Hope! our Joy! our Friend! Himself we long to welcome, And just beyond the bend Hidden, perchance to meet us Before the day is done, The waiting will be over And rest will have begun.
